@graph.rdfs:comment: A collection of data, particularly focused on PV power production metrics and environmental data.
@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of what the dataset contains.
@graph.rdfs:label: Description

@graph.rdfs:comment: A self-description of the dataset, consisting of a list of DatasetDescription objects.
@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset Self-Description

@graph.rdfs:comment: A list of TimeSeries objects associated with the dataset, each representing a sequence of data points collected over time.
@graph.rdfs:label: Time Series List

@graph.rdfs:comment: This property holds a list of resources, each being a specific type of metadata object related to the dataset. The types include, but are not limited to, GeoLocalizedDataset, Installation, BuildingDataset, or LECDataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: Specific Metadata

@graph.rdfs:comment: A dataset that includes geographical location information such as latitude, longitude, elevation, and postal code.
@graph.rdfs:label: GeoLocalizedDataset

@graph.rdfs:comment: The latitude of the geographical location.
@graph.rdfs:label: Latitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: The longitude of the geographical location of the whole dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: Longitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: The elevation of the geographical location above sea level.
@graph.rdfs:label: Elevation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The postal code of the geographical location.
@graph.rdfs:label: Postal Code

@graph.rdfs:comment: A dataset that includes detailed information about a building's characteristics, energy consumption, materials, and more.
@graph.rdfs:label: BuildingDataset

@graph.rdfs:comment: The physical address of the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Address

@graph.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: BuildingID

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total floor area of the building in square meters.
@graph.rdfs:label: Floor Area

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total number of floors in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Number of Floors

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total annual energy consumption of the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Total Annual Energy Consumption

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the building's total annual energy consumption (e.g., kWh, MWh).
@graph.rdfs:label: Total Annual Energy Consumption Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: The current status of the building (e.g., occupied, under construction, vacant).
@graph.rdfs:label: Building Status

@graph.rdfs:comment: The age of the building in years.
@graph.rdfs:label: Building Age

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of insulation material used in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Insulation Material

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total surface area of the insulation used in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Insulation Surface

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the insulation surface (e.g., square meters).
@graph.rdfs:label: Insulation Surface Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: The thickness of the insulation used in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Insulation Thickness

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the insulation thickness (e.g., centimeters).
@graph.rdfs:label: Insulation Thickness Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total area of openings (windows, doors) in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Openings Area

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the area of openings.
@graph.rdfs:label: Openings Surface Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of glazing used for windows in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Glazing Type

@graph.rdfs:comment: The material used for window and door frames in the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Frame Material

@graph.rdfs:comment: The primary source of heating for the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Heating Source

@graph.rdfs:comment: The primary source of cooling for the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Cooling Source

@graph.rdfs:comment: A list of OccupantsMetadata objects associated with the building, detailing information about different groups of occupants.
@graph.rdfs:label: Occupants List

@graph.rdfs:comment: Metadata about the occupants of a building, including number, age groups, salary range, and average time spent at home.
@graph.rdfs:label: OccupantsMetadata

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total number of occupants within the building.
@graph.rdfs:label: Number of Occupants

@graph.rdfs:comment: Categorization of occupants based on age groups.
@graph.rdfs:label: Age Groups

@graph.rdfs:comment: The salary range of the occupants, typically expressed as a bracket or average.
@graph.rdfs:label: Salary Range

@graph.rdfs:comment: Average time spent at home by the occupants, which could be expressed in hours per day or similar units.
@graph.rdfs:label: Average Time at Home

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about a specific installation, including type, capacity, and the unit of capacity.
@graph.rdfs:label: Installation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of installation (e.g., solar panels, wind turbine).
@graph.rdfs:label: Installation Type

@graph.rdfs:comment: The installed capacity of the system, typically measured in kW or MW.
@graph.rdfs:label: Installed Capacity

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the installed capacity (e.g., kW, MW).
@graph.rdfs:label: Installed Capacity Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: Manufacturer of the installation.
@graph.rdfs:label: Installation Manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a dataset specific to Local Energy Communities (LEC), including general information such as the name of the LEC and the number of buildings within it.
@graph.rdfs:label: LECDataset

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the Local Energy Community (LEC) or dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The total number of buildings within the Local Energy Community (LEC).
@graph.rdfs:label: Number of Building

@graph.rdfs:comment: A series of data points collected over time, associated with a specific dataset and field, including details about the timing and granularity of data collection.
@graph.rdfs:label: TimeSeries

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifies the specific dataset field associated with this time series.
@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset Field ID

@graph.rdfs:comment: The starting point in time for the time series, represented in UTC.
@graph.rdfs:label: UTC Timestamp Start

@graph.rdfs:comment: The ending point in time for the time series, represented in UTC.
@graph.rdfs:label: UTC Timestamp End

@graph.rdfs:comment: The time zone offset from UTC for the time series data, typically represented as an integer (e.g., '-5' for UTC-5).
@graph.rdfs:label: Time Zone

@graph.rdfs:comment: latitude of the time series.
@graph.rdfs:label: Latitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: longitude of the time series.
@graph.rdfs:label: Longitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes the granularity of the time series data collection (e.g., hourly, daily).
@graph.rdfs:label: Granularity

@graph.rdfs:comment: A list of DataPoint objects associated with the time series, each representing an individual measurement or observation.
@graph.rdfs:label: Timeseries Data Point List

@graph.rdfs:comment: This property holds a list of resources, each being a specific type of metadata object related to the Time series . The types include, but are not limited to, PVPanel, Energymeter, WindTurbine,EnergyStorage or EVChargingStation
@graph.rdfs:label: Specific Metadata

@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents an individual measurement or observation within a time series, identified by its field type, timestamp, and the measured value.
@graph.rdfs:label: DataPoint

@graph.rdfs:comment: The exact time at which this data point was recorded, represented in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
@graph.rdfs:label: UTC Timestamp

@graph.rdfs:comment: The value of the observation or measurement for this data point.
@graph.rdfs:label: Value

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about an electric vehicle charging station, including provider, location, and capacity.
@graph.rdfs:label: EVChargingStation
Service Provider
@graph.rdfs:comment: The entity providing the EV charging service.

@graph.rdfs:label: Network Operator
@graph.rdfs:comment: The operator of the EV charging network.

@graph.rdfs:label: Max Power
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum power output of the EV charging station (in kW).

@graph.rdfs:label: Address
@graph.rdfs:comment: Physical address of the EV charging station.
Details of an energy meter device, including its ID, load type, maximum power, and whether it is programmable.
@graph.rdfs:label: EnergyMeter
Device ID
@graph.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the energy meter device.

@graph.rdfs:label: Load Type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of load measured by the energy meter.

@graph.rdfs:label: Programmable
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the energy meter is programmable.
Generic sensor that produces a time series
@graph.rdfs:label: Sensor
Sensor ID
@graph.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the sensor

@graph.rdfs:label: Location
@graph.rdfs:comment: Location of the sensor (indoor, outdoor, Kitchen etc
Information on an energy storage unit, including type, capacity, and depth of discharge.
@graph.rdfs:label: EnergyStorage
Energy Storage Type
@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of energy storage (e.g., battery, thermal storage).

@graph.rdfs:label: Capacity
@graph.rdfs:comment: The energy capacity of the storage unit.

@graph.rdfs:label: Capacity Unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: Unit of measurement for the energy capacity (e.g., kWh, MWh).

@graph.rdfs:label: Maximum Percentage Depth of Discharge
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum recommended depth of discharge for the storage unit, expressed as a percentage.
Provides a structured description of a dataset, including metadata and identification.
@graph.rdfs:label: DatasetDescription

@graph.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the dataset description.
@graph.rdfs:label: DatasetDescription ID

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of metadata associated with the dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset Metadata Type

@graph.rdfs:comment: A list of DatasetField objects associated with the dataset description, detailing the fields covered by the dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset Fields

@graph.rdfs:comment: Represents a specific field within a dataset, potentially linked to time series metadata.
@graph.rdfs:label: DatasetField

@graph.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the dataset field.
@graph.rdfs:label: DatasetField ID

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifies the type of time series metadata associated with this dataset field.
@graph.rdfs:label: Timeseries Metadata Type

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the dataset field.
@graph.rdfs:label: Name

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of the dataset field.
@graph.rdfs:label: Description

@graph.rdfs:comment: Fieldtype object describing the field
@graph.rdfs:label: object

@graph.rdfs:comment: Defines the type of a dataset field, including its unit and whether it is suitable for averaging, summing, or anonymizing.
@graph.rdfs:label: FieldType

@graph.rdfs:comment: A unique identifier for the field type.
@graph.rdfs:label: FieldType ID

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the dataset field.
@graph.rdfs:label: Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the dataset field can be averaged.
@graph.rdfs:label: Averagable

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the dataset field can be summed.
@graph.rdfs:label: Summable

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the dataset field can be anonymized.
@graph.rdfs:label: Anonymizable

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about a photovoltaic panel installation, including geographic location, orientation, capacity, and technology specifications.
@graph.rdfs:label: PVPanel

@graph.rdfs:comment: Field identifier linking the PV panel to its corresponding dataset field.
@graph.rdfs:label: Field ID

@graph.rdfs:comment: The tilt angle of the PV panel from horizontal.
@graph.rdfs:label: Tilt

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the tilt angle (e.g., degrees, radians).
@graph.rdfs:label: Tilt Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: The azimuth orientation angle of the PV panel (typically 0째 = North, 90째 = East, 180째 = South, 270째 = West).
@graph.rdfs:label: Orientation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the orientation angle (e.g., degrees, radians).
@graph.rdfs:label: Orientation Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of photovoltaic technology used (e.g., monocrystalline, polycrystalline, thin-film, PERC).
@graph.rdfs:label: Technology

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about a Domestic Hot Water system, including tank specifications, heat source, and solar thermal integration.
@graph.rdfs:label: DHW

@graph.rdfs:comment: The storage capacity of the domestic hot water tank.
@graph.rdfs:label: Tank Capacity

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the tank capacity (e.g., liters, gallons).
@graph.rdfs:label: Tank Capacity Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether solar thermal heating is available and integrated with the DHW system.
@graph.rdfs:label: Solar Thermal Availability

@graph.rdfs:comment: The primary heat source for the domestic hot water system (e.g., electric, gas, solar, heat pump, biomass).
@graph.rdfs:label: Heat Source

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about an energy market, including the country and additional context or comments.
@graph.rdfs:label: EnergyMarket

@graph.rdfs:comment: The country where the energy market operates.
@graph.rdfs:label: Country

@graph.rdfs:comment: Additional comments or context about the energy market.
@graph.rdfs:label: Comment

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about a Wind Turbine, including type, altitude and altitude unit.
@graph.rdfs:label: WindTurbine
Wind Turbine Type
@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of wind turbine (e.g., HAWT (Horizontal Axis Wind Turbine), VAWT (Vertical Axis Wind Turbine)).
The altitude of the wind turbine's location.
@graph.rdfs:label: Wind Turbine Location Altitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the turbine location's altitude (e.g., m).
@graph.rdfs:label: Altitude Unit

@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about a Wind Station, including geographic location (latitude, longitude) and maximum power capacity.
@graph.rdfs:label: WindStation
Maximum Power
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum power capacity of the wind station.

@graph.rdfs:label: Maximum Power Unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the maximum power capacity (e.g., kW, MW).
Dataset for battery energy storage system optimization, including battery specifications, state of charge parameters, and grid interaction fees.
@graph.rdfs:label: BatteryOptimizationDataset
Battery Capacity
@graph.rdfs:comment: The total energy storage capacity of the battery.

@graph.rdfs:label: Battery Capacity Unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for battery capacity (e.g., kWh, MWh).

@graph.rdfs:label: Battery Power
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum charging/discharging power rating of the battery.

@graph.rdfs:label: Battery Power Unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for battery power (e.g., kW, MW).

@graph.rdfs:label: Battery Efficiency
@graph.rdfs:comment: The round-trip efficiency of the battery system (ratio between 0 and 1).

@graph.rdfs:label: Initial State of Charge
@graph.rdfs:comment: The initial state of charge of the battery at the start of the optimization period (ratio between 0 and 1).

@graph.rdfs:label: Final State of Charge
@graph.rdfs:comment: The desired final state of charge of the battery at the end of the optimization period (ratio between 0 and 1).

@graph.rdfs:label: Minimum State of Charge
@graph.rdfs:comment: The minimum allowable state of charge for battery operation (ratio between 0 and 1).

@graph.rdfs:label: Maximum State of Charge
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum allowable state of charge for battery operation (ratio between 0 and 1).

@graph.rdfs:label: Export Price Factor
@graph.rdfs:comment: The factor applied to electricity prices when exporting energy to the grid (ratio between 0 and 1).

@graph.rdfs:label: Grid Import Fee
@graph.rdfs:comment: The fee charged per unit of energy imported from the grid.

@graph.rdfs:label: Grid Export Fee
@graph.rdfs:comment: The fee charged per unit of energy exported to the grid.
Information about a Photovoltaic (PV) Station, including geographic location (latitude, longitude) and maximum power capacity.
@graph.rdfs:label: PVStation
Maximum Power
@graph.rdfs:comment: The maximum power capacity of the station.

@graph.rdfs:label: Maximum Power Unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: The unit of measurement for the maximum power capacity (e.g., kW, MW).
